DOC.detailed_description: Depression serious health condition place tremendous burden patient healthcare system especially prevalent Veterans . In 2008 , VHA release Uniform Mental Health Services Handbook ( Handbook 1160.01 ) effort expand service Veterans depression , include primary care CBOC setting . The VA invest significant resource improve access high-quality mental health care , include rapid expansion CBOCs . Currently , need work clinician stakeholder address practice barrier related mental health practice CBOCs . A recent survey 4,200 mental health provider VA find , although robust expansion improve quality mental health care service occur , access proven effective psychotherapy CBOCs remain focused area improvement .
